The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 February is 3,480,147 (6,182.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 February, there were 119,658 new confirmed cases (212.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 January, there were 159,227 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (39,569 fewer cases).
